evidence.source_document: Order Granting Temporary Restraining Order and Compelling Certain Discovery Production (001)
evidence.text: the order also instructed agency heads to submit within 180 days “to reorganize the agency, if appropriate, in order to improve the efficiency, effectiveness, and accountability of that agency.”
